text: Apologies for the #powercut in #Cardiff #CF14 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 00:00. Drew
Good evening. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands affected by a #powercut. Call us on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
Power supplies are restored at #Bristol #BS15 area. We apologise for any disruption caused by the #powercut this evening.
Power supplies are restored at #Falmouth #TR11 and surrounding areas. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Bristol #BS15 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 19:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We're aware of a #powercut in #Falmouth #TR11 due to damage at a substation. We're currently trying to restore power by 18:30. Drew

Good evening. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands. To report a #powercut or other electrical emergency call us at any time on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
All power supplies are restored at #Neath #SA11 and the surrounding areas. We apologise for any inconvenience caused this evening due to the #powercut

There is currently a #powercut in #Cimla #Neath #SA11 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 21:00 time. 
We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Fiona

Good evening. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands. To report a #powercut or other electrical emergency call us at any time on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Brixton PL8 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 16:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Belper #DE56 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Belper #DE56 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 11:30. Andi.
Good morning. I'll be here @gridcustomersuk throughout the night to help customers in #southWales, the #West and #Midlands affected by a #powercut. Call us on 0800 6783 105 or just 105. David.
Apologies for the #powercut in #Derby #DE21 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 16:30. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Telford #TF4 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Telford #TF4 surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 10:30. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Spalding #PE12 have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
Engineers are working on a #powercut affecting customers in #Spalding #PE12 and estimate to restore all supplies by 15:00. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
All customers now have their supply restored following the #powercut in #Derby #DE21. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
